blogPost.excerpt: Krypto allows you to invest, trade, gift, and pay with cryptocurrency seamlessly to anyone, anywhere, anytime. 🎉 Trade For free 💎 Pay with Crypto to any vendor in India having a UPI address or debit card machine 🚀 Send & Recieve Crypto for free
blogPost.body: Krypto allows you to invest, trade, gift, and pay with cryptocurrency seamlessly to anyone, anywhere, anytime. 🎉 Trade For free 💎 Pay with Crypto to any vendor in India having a UPI address or debit card machine 🚀 Send & Recieve Crypto for free
blogPost.title: Krypto - Buy, sell and pay with crypto for free
blogPost.author: Shaaran Lakshminarayanan

localize.description: Krypto允许你在任何时间，任何地点，向任何人无缝地投资，交易，馈赠和支付加密货币。🎉 Trade For free 💎 Pay with Crypto to any vendor in India having a UPI address or debit card machine 🚀 Send & Recieve Crypto for free.
localize.tagline: 免费使用加密技术进行购买、出售和支付。

localize.description: Krypto允許你在任何時間，任何地點，向任何人無縫地投資，交易，饋贈和支付加密貨幣。🎉 Trade For free 💎 Pay with Crypto to any vendor in India having a UPI address or debit card machine 🚀 Send & Recieve Crypto for free.
localize.tagline: 免費使用加密技術進行購買、出售和支付。

previous.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
previous.title: Firework Web Story Platform - B2B Version of TikTok

localize.description: Firework将TikTok/IG/Snap Story的体验带入任何网站或任何应用。A轮融资5500万美元，我们的目标是联合开放的互联网（去中心化和开放）来对抗巨大的社交媒体（中心化和封闭）。
Firework將TikTok/IG/Snap Story的體驗帶入任何網站或任何應用。A輪融資5500萬美元，我們的目標是聯合開放的互聯網（去中心化和開放）來對抗巨大的社交媒體（中心化和封閉）。

next.excerpt: Lyne uses an advanced AI model to analyze each of your prospects their online profiles and writes a hyper-personalized introduction to them, which you can use in your cold outreach messaging.
next.title: Lyne - Scale your cold email campaigns with AI powered intros

localize.description: Lyne使用先进的人工智能模型来分析你的每一个潜在客户的在线资料，并为他们撰写超个性化的介绍，你可以在你的冷门宣传信息中使用。
localize.tagline: 利用人工智能驱动的开场白来扩展您的冷门电子邮件营销。

localize.description: Lyne使用先進的人工智能模型來分析你的每一個潛在客戶的在線資料，併爲他們撰寫超個性化的介紹，你可以在你的冷門宣傳信息中使用。
localize.tagline: 利用人工智能驅動的開場白來擴展您的冷門電子郵件營銷。
